Summary: SAW FAST MOVING BRIGHT GREEN LIGHT
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my sunroom in midtown Atlanta Georgia and I noticed a brightgreen light travelling at a VERY high rate of speed. I am a trained privatepilot and have never seen an aircraft travel descend at this rate of speed, norseen any aircraft in the Atlanta traffic pattern travel at the velocity of thelight. I noticed the object in my peripheral vision while watching television. I thought the object was a crashing aircraft or some type of missile. I turnedto my wife and she saw the object as well. A bright green object decending orcrashing, off the horizon in the area of piedmont park, Atlanta, Ga.
